name: Ice Cream Quest
description:
Teddy is hungry and he wants ice cream on his way a mage gets in the way of him and his food, Teddy is ready to face any danger on his way to get what he wants. Will you succeed and get the ultimate ice cream cone or perish by the hands of the mage’s minions.

Ice Cream Adventure is a game with a simple premise get ice cream no matter the danger.

The game has a simple combat mechanic and a platform jumping as core mechanics that get used in every level within different contexts and applications.

The game takes inspiration of the classic 8-bit Castlevanias and the combat segments of the infamous “Zelda 2: Adventure of Link”, both games work in different ways with 2D combat and platformer, still i tried to make Ice Cream Adventure have a unique feeling.

Made with Unity as learning project.
